title: Modern Warfare 3 MP And Zombies Review
description: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 takes a risk using recycled content to sell nostalgia, but the payoff is enticing gameplay with classic features.

title: The Marvel Cinematic Universe Is Broken, And Marvel Can Only Blame Itself
description:
The hits never stop coming for Marvel during its so-called Multiverse Saga. The Marvel Cinematic Universe juggernaut has spent nearly the entire post-Avengers: Endgame period mired in one mess or another, constantly shuffling around its release schedule and, as a result, having to seemingly rewrite, reshoot and re-edit all of its movies and shows on the fly to accommodate everything that was going on.

Unfortunately, it doesn't look like that's going to stop any time soon. The Marvels, basically the franchise's title movie at this point--following up on the Captain Marvel film, as well as Disney+ shows WandaVision and Ms. Marvel, without actually giving viewers any reason to watch them--is bombing at the box office, the Jonath

title: Burn Rubber, Not Your Wallet - Gran Turismo 7 Drops To $30 For PS5
description:
Gran Turismo 7 is just one of numerous PlayStation games and products discounted to its best price yet during Black Friday 2023. Over at Amazon, you can grab the PS5's marquee racing game for only $30. Previous sales discounted the game to $40, so this is a really great offer. Meanwhile, PS4 players can get the game for only $20.

title: Sailor Moon Limited-Edition Box Sets Are Over 50% Off For Black Friday
description:
Sailor Moon is available on a variety of streaming services, but if you're looking to build your own anime collection, you'll want to check out Amazon's early Black Friday deals. Not only will you find a wide variety of Sailor Moon Blu-rays on sale, but the expensive Crystal Sets (featuring a bunch of collectibles) are down to some of their lowest prices of the year.

Typically sold for $80, the Sailor Moon Crystal Set 1 Limited Edition is down to $35. Along with a Blu-ray, you'll get premium prints and an art book. It's all pulled together by a gorgeous box set, giving you an elegant way to display the item in your home. A similar deal is also available for the Crystal Set 2 and

title: Razer Wolverine Xbox Controllers Are Up To 50% Off At Amazon
description:
There's no shortage of controllers for Xbox and PC these days, but if you're looking for a competitive edge, then Razer's line of V2 Chroma controllers are worth considering. As part of Amazon's Black Friday 2023 sale, you can get the Razer Wolverine V2 Chroma in white or black for $90. Considering this controller normally costs $150, this is a pretty awesome deal.

title: The Legend Of Zelda Collector's Edition Books Get Huge Discounts For Black Friday
description:
Black Friday deals are popping up earlier than ever this year, and right now you'll find more than a dozen Zelda books on sale for some of their lowest prices of the season. Whether you're interested in the official Tears of the Kingdom guide or want to get a behind-the-scenes look at what goes into making a Zelda game, a little bit of everything is discounted at Amazon.

The most compelling book on sale is Tears of the Kingdom: Official Guide (Collector's Edition), which is nearly 50% off with a new price of $27. Clocking in at a staggering 496 pages, it covers literally everything you'd ever want to know about the game. This includes a full walkthrough for not just the main quests but also its shrines, caves, and side adventures. Best of all, it's wrapped in a gorgeous hardcover with a striking gold and brow

title: Watch Call Of Duty: MW3 And Warzone Cheaters Go Splat
description:
Call of Duty continues to make improvements to the Ricochet anti-cheat, and Activision reveals the recently announced "Splat" feature is now live in Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone. A new video shared by Call of Duty shows exactly what it looks like when cheaters are detected by Ricochet, and it's pretty funny to watch how they get trolled.

This new anti-cheat update causes verified Warzone cheaters to have their parachutes clipped, leaving them to fall to their death with a splat. The feature also affects Modern Warfare 3's multiplayer, and as shown in Call of Duty's test video below, even a small and normally survivable jump causes a cheater's death. This hilariou

title: Catch Up On The Pokemon Anime With These Great Price Cuts
description:
The Pokemon universe has grown a bit unwieldy over the past decade, with its anime seeing dozens of spin-offs and even branching out onto the big screen. Tuning in to all the content is time-consuming, but during Amazon's early Black Friday event, it doesn't have to be expensive. Dozens of DVDs and Blu-rays are on sale right now, making this a great time to fill your shelves with Pokemon adventures.

See all anime deals

If you're looking for a Blu-ray, the s

title: Super Mario RPG: Where To Find All Flags For 3 Musty Fears And Unlock The Ghost Medal
description:
There are a lot of useful accessories in Super Mario RPG, but the Ghost Medal ranks among some of the best since it halves the damage its wearer takes. To get it, though, you'll first need to find three flags for a group called the 3 Musty Fears, whom you'll encounter when sleeping in a specific bed in Monstro Town. Below, we'll tell you everything you need to know about encountering the 3 Musty Fears and finding the flags for them.

Where to get the flags for the 3 Musty Fears in Super Mario RPG

To start the 3 Musty Fears' flag quest, head to the home closest to the stairs in Monstro Town. Enter the bed and go to sleep to be visited by a Dry Bones, a Boo, and a Greaper--collectively known as the 3 Musty Fears. They'll ask you to track down three flags for them across the world, which shouldn't take long with the information we've got for you here.

These are the locations of

title: CoD: Modern Warfare 3 Zombies Season 1 Detailed: New Story Tease, Wonder Weapon, And More
description:
Activision has provided a first look at the upcoming Season 1 update for Modern Warfare 3, which includes a tease for the continuation of the Zombies storyline, Dark Aether rifts, and new acquisition schematics to unlock.

Currently, players have three story acts to complete for a set of story cinematics, but Season 1 is set to expand Treyarch's ongoing narrative. As teased in the latest Call of Duty blog post, players will be tasked to investigate a massive, mysterious gateway appearing on the Urzikstan map.

Dark Aether Rifts are another Season 1 addition. These rifts are a new endgame experience to master once players have completed the seasonal mission. The blog describes them as a way for players to "encounter a sinister and chaotic challenge,"

title: Dune 2 Gets Exciting Update About Its Release Date
description:
Dune: Part Two was supposed to be in theaters already, but WB Discovery delayed the film to 2024 back in August. Now, the sci-fi film's release date has changed again--but in a good way.

According to The Hollywood Reporter, Dune: Part Two is now scheduled to hit theaters on March 1, 2024, which is two weeks earlier than its previously planned March 15 release date. The Dune sequel scooped up the March 1 date after Universal's The Fall Guy starring Ryan Gosling moved off that date recently.

Directed by Denis Villeneuve, Dune: Part Two brings back Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Rebecca Ferguson, and others from the first film, in addition to new roles played by Florence Pugh, Austin Butler, and Christopher Walken.

title: Everything Alan Wake 2 Reveals About The Remedy Connected Universe
description:
While Alan Wake 2 is already a mind-bending game in its own right, it's made even more complex given how the series fits into the Remedy Connected Universe (RCU), which is the official name the Finnish studio gives to its connected story world that so far includes Alan Wake, Control, and Alan Wake 2. With so much more learned about the RCU through the events of Alan Wake 2, we sought to round up every new detail and put them in one place for future reference. It stands to reason that Remedy will be building on its intertwined world for years to come, so consider this a bookmark-worthy reference guide for Control 2 or other connected games in the future.

As ever, Max Payne and Quantum Break are not truly a part of the RCU, though given Remedy's penchant for "echoes," slight nods to those series tol

title: How Long Is Super Mario RPG?
description:
When it comes to RPGs, you can usually expect to spend quite a lot of time exploring a dense, lore-filled world, customizing your character's stats, and engaging with strategic combat. With Nintendo's remake of Super Mario RPG, though, that's not quite the case. This refresh of the 1996 classic is filled with creativity and charm, but it provides a short and sweet campaign and a limited amount of post-game content.

That being said, as with most games, how long it takes you to complete Super Mario RPG will depend largely on what goals you're trying to accomplish in the game. Here's everything you need to know about how long it takes to beat this colorful remake.

How long is Super Mario RPG?

An average playthrough of Super Mario RPG, which would involve completing the main story and a bit of optional content, should land most players at around 13 hours. However, those looking to get through just the main

title: These Intel And AMD Processors Are On Sale For Black Friday
description:
If you're trying to build a new gaming rig or upgrade your existing battlestation, Amazon is running a massive sale on Intel and AMD CPUs that deserves a closer look. The discounts are offered as part of its early Black Friday promotions, making this a great time to pick up hardware at great low prices.

One of the cheapest items on sale is the Intel Core i5-12600K, listed for just $153 (down from $215). That's the lowest ever price for the CPU, and it’s a great choice if you're looking to upgrade an older rig. If you want something powerful, consider stepping up to the Intel Core i7-12700K for $211 (down from $277) or the

title: Star Wars: Knights Of The Old Republic Remake Is No Longer In Development - Report
description:
Embracer Group's troubled Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic remake is reportedly no longer in active development, according to GameSpot sister site Giant Bomb's Jeff Grubb.

In the latest episode of Grubb's video game news show Game Mess Mornings, Grubb definitively stated that the Knights of the Old Republic remake, once being handled by developer Aspyr Media but later announced to be a co-project between it and Saber Interactive, is not being worked on right now.

"This game is not being worked on right now, full stop," Grubb said. "This game is not being worked on in any way, at any studio."

title: COD: Modern Warfare 3 Season 1 Update Detailed: First Look At New Maps And More
description:
Activision has announced more details on the upcoming Season 1 update for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, including a first look at the new core multiplayer maps coming to the game.

Modern Warfare III currently has a roster of 16 core multiplayer maps, and they are all reimagined versions of maps from 2009's Modern Warfare II. When Season 1 launches in early December, though, fans will get brand-new core multiplayer maps for 6v6 modes.

title: Half-Life Gets 25th Anniversary Update And Steam Deck Support
description:
The classic FPS Half-Life just turned 25 and got a shockingly large update on Steam with new content, graphics upgrades, bug fixes, and Steam Deck support. Half-Life is currently free to own on Steam until November 20.

For new content, the update adds four brand-new multiplayer maps from Valve level designers. These are a waste facility called Contamination, an abandoned Xen outpost called Pool Party, a radioactive waste plant called Disposal, and a satellite launch facility called Rocket Frenzy. It adds Half-Life Uplink, a mini-campaign that was originally packaged with magazines and hardware like sound cards. Finally, the update includes content made for the 1999 expansion Half-Life: Further Data. This includes three multiplayer maps, two fan-favorite skins (a skeleton with colored eyes and the oddly titled Too Much Coffee Man), and dozens of sprays.

As for graphics and visual updates, the UI will now properly scale at higher-resolution screens. You can also disable

title: CoD: Modern Warfare 3 Patch Notes Include Movement Changes And Fix For A Major Zombies Issue
description:
A new update is out now for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3, and the November 17 patch notes include a fix for one of Zombies most annoying issues and brings major adjustments to the game's slide movement.

Movement is a big deal in Modern Warfare 3, and this update works to improve the fluidity of sliding. This was done with a 75% decrease to the Tac Sprint refresh delay and by reducing the sprint delay after sliding by 53%. The developer says this change was made after player feedback determined that the previous delay was too aggressive.

Another significant change includes an adjustment to how the game's Armory Unlock challenges work, as wins will now progress Armory Unlocks without players first needing to complete their daily challenges.

title: Green Man Gaming Black Friday Deals Are Now Live And Offer Big PC Game Discounts
description:
Green Man Gaming's Black Friday sale is now on, and for PC gamers looking to score a few deals on recent games, there's plenty here to look at. As a bonus, one lucky shopper will win a year's worth of games from Green Man Gaming after they've made an eligible purchase.

Marvel's Midnight Suns is a terrific game from XCOM studio Firaxis, as you'll command the mightiest mortals from that comic book universe in their battle against Lillith and other nefarious forces. Speaking of XCOM, you can get the entire collection of intense turn-based tactical action on sale as well. Who knew that having infinite time between turns could make you sweat this much?

Green Man Gaming Black Friday Deals

title: Call Of Duty's Press "F To Pay Respects" Meme Get Nod In MW3 Zombies
description:
Modern Warfare 3's Zombies mode is filled with plenty of secrets to uncover, including one that features a throwback to one of Call of Duty's greatest memes. Players have quickly discovered a location on the Urzikstan map that features a grave where you can "Press F To Pay Respects."

This gravesite is a throwback to 2014's Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare, where players are granted an odd interaction during a funeral cutscene, allowing them to pay respects by pressing a button to touch a soldier's coffin.

As shown in the video shared by Reddit user Disastrous-Ad-9084, the burial site can be found just southwest of Old Town at the top of the castle in the map's highest threat zone. The grave is marked by a collection of weapons sticking out of the ground

title: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales Ultimate Drops To Lowest Price Yet
description:

title: Steven Yeun Revealed As Sentry In MCU Debut
description:
In a recent interview with comic book artist David Finch, The Walking Dead creator Robert Kirkman let fly that Steven Yeun is set to play the role of Sentry in the upcoming Marvel Cinematic Universe film, Thunderbolts. During a conversation live-streamed on Thursday, Kirkman disclosed the casting, stating, "My good friend Steven Yeun is playing the Sentry in a movie."

Sentry, also known as Robert Reynolds, made his debut in the comic books in 2000 and has since been a part of many Marvel series, including New Avengers and the Dark Avengers. The character's storyline revolves around Reynolds' rediscovery of his superhero identity and the impending return of his archenemy, the Void. Rumors of Yeun playing a significant role in the movie surfaced in February, but it remaine

title: Tons Of GPUs Are On Sale Ahead Of Black Friday
description:
Upgrading your GPU is never cheap, but as part of Amazon's early Black Friday event, a variety of Nvidia GeForce and AMD Radeon products are seeing steep price cuts. This includes a variety of hardware from the RTX 40 series and RTX 30 series lineup--some of which are discounted by up to $150.

One of the best deals is for the ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 3050 OC Edition, which is just $230 (down from $380). That puts it just a few dollars shy of its lowest price ever. And while the RTX 3050 isn't the most powerful GPU in the lineup, this is the perfect way to upgrade an aging desktop without dropping much cash.

If you want something with a bit more power, you'll find the ASUS Phoenix GeForce RTX 3060

title: New On Disney Plus In December 2023: Indiana Jones 4, Percy Jackson, Marvel's What If Season 2
description:
As we approach December, Disney+ unveils its upcoming content schedule for the next month. Starting on December 1, viewers can look forward to a lineup of titles set to debut throughout the final month of the year.

December 1 brings a significant release to Disney+: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny, possibly marking Harrison Ford's last adventure as the iconic character. Plenty has been written about the sequel's struggles to turn a profit, but it's a solid return to form, blending one-liners, thrilling action, and profound philosophical exploration. On the same day, Disney+ will also release the documentary Timeless Heroes: Indiana Jones and Harrison Ford, offering a deeper look into the franchise. Watch the documentary trailer below for a sneak peek.

On December 20, Percy Jackson and the Olympians will have a two-episode premiere. The series adaptation of the popular fantasy novels "tells the fantastical story o

title: Where Is Xur Today? (November 17-21) Destiny 2 Exotic Items And Xur Location Guide
description:
Xur has arrived, bringing with him a fresh supply of new weapons and armor as Season of the Witch winds down. With Season of the Wish arriving soon alongside an overhauled version of Dragon's Breath, now is a good time to invest in new Exotics and Legendary-class gear for the final season of Lightfall. Here's where Xur is this weekend and what he has for sale.

This week you can find Xur on Nessus, in The Watcher's Grave. For his weapon, Xur is offering The Colony. Hunters can pick up St0mp-EE5 leg armor; Titans can grab Wormgod Caress gauntlets; and Warlocks can buy the Felwinter's Helm helmet.

title: Dragon's Dogma 2 Release Date Seemingly Leaked
description:
According to the PEGI rating for Dragon's Dogma II, the game could be releasing on March 22, 2024.

The rating page for Dragon's Dogma II has seemingly been deleted now, but not before a screenshot was captured by Gematsu. It lists the March date for all platforms that the game will launch on, including PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

Capcom announced earlier today that it would be holding a Dragon's Dogma II showcase on November 28. It will last 15 minutes, show brand new gameplay, and be presented by director Hideaki Itsuno and producer Yoshiaki Hirabayashi. While Capcom has not confirmed a release date yet, it's certainly possible that it could be revealed at this showcase. However, if it isn't, then The G

title: Black Friday Funko Pops Discounts Bring The Entire Multiverse To Your Desk
description:
If there's something moderately popular at the movies or on TV, there's a good bet that you'll find a Funko Pop figure of it soon. One of the most popular collectibles around, Funko Pops are everywhere and they have their legions of fans. It's not hard to see why, as these cute trinkets don't take up much room, celebrate various spheres of pop culture, and aren't expensive. For Black Friday 2023, you can grab several of these collectible figures at really good prices, and there's a wide variety to choose from.

  • Loki Collectors set 2 - Mobius, President Loki, and Ravonna Ren

title: A Bunch Of PS5 Exclusives Are On Sale For Black Friday
description:
Looking to stock up on video games ahead of the holidays? Then you'll want to check out the latest selection of PS5 exclusives on sale at Amazon, which includes hits like Ghost of Tsushima, Gran Turismo 7, and other popular titles. These deals are part of the retailer's early Black Friday event, which means you'll likely have until November 27 to cash in on the savings--though it's always possible they'll sell out ahead of time.

While Spider-Man 2 isn't seeing any major discounts, you can snag Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales Ultimate Edition for $35 (down from $70). Consider

title: New On Hulu In December 2023: The Matrix Quadrilogy, Paddington 2
description:
With December just around the corner, Hulu has released its schedule of all the new content coming to the streaming service next month. Starting December 1, viewers can look forward to a lineup of titles set to debut throughout the final month of the year.

In December, Hulu offers a prime opportunity to catch up on recent and classic movies. Starting December 1, popular films including The Bourne Identity, Magic Mike, National Treasure, Tombstone, and the first three films in The Matrix franchise will be available. The fourth Matrix movie, 2021's Matrix Resurrections, arrives on December 10, marking the franchise's return after a two-decade hiatus, and it was--in case you didn't see it or may not remember--well-received as the best installment since the original. You can check out GameSpot's review of Matrix Resurrections for more details.

title: Prepare For Final Fantasy VII Rebirth With New Official Recap Video
description:
Ahead of the game's February 2024 release date, Square Enix has put out a story recap video for Final Fantasy VII Rebirth explaining all the events leading up to highly anticipated sequel.

The video focuses more or less entirely on the events of Final Fantasy VII Remake. The video is narrated by Red XIII and is a fairly straightforward point summary of Remake. For example, it doesn't bring in any of the narrative from Final Fantasy VII Compilation games like Crisis Core or Dirge of Cerberus, which have proven to be surprisingly relevant to the remake's trilogy's overall plot. Still, as a starting point, it will help you hop into Rebirth without any prior experience or get a quick refresher on where the last game left off. The video will be featured in the game's full release.

The Rebirth team has teased potential changes comin

title: The Dark Knight Rises With These Batman Black Friday Graphic Novel Deals
description:
Nothing beats a good graphic novel as winter draws closer, and if you're looking to update your library with some Dark Knight material, these Black Friday deals on Batman's greatest adventures are not to be missed. Amazon is offering several of the Caped Crusader's greatest hits for Black Friday, giving you the chance to pick up classic tales and modern-day masterpieces at a greatly reduced price.

Starting with a few must-have titles, The slipcase edition of The Dark Knight Returns is a luxurious version of one of the greatest Batman stories of all time. This dark story is set in Batman's future long after he has retired from fighting crime, but after one fateful night that reignites the beast inside of him, Bruce Wayne suits up once again to bring justice to Gotham City. The Dark Knight Returns was a critical hit when it was first released, and this run of the four-part mini-series reprints each issue in its own hardcover

title: Dragon Ball Blu-Rays Power Up With Black Friday Discounts
description:
Dragon Ball has long been the go-to anime for anyone looking to try out some Japanese animation. It's not hard to see why, as the franchise combines fun storytelling with lovable characters and planet-shaking battles that have become the gold standard for other anime series in the action genre. For Black Friday 2023, you can score some big discounts on various Dragon Ball series and movies.

For Dragon Ball Z fans, the Kai Blu-rays are very good updates of the TV series. This release cleans up the original animation quite nicely, is mostly uncensored, and even goes the extra mile with fresh English dubs that are more faithful to the source material. There aren't too many bonus features on the Kai collections, but when you've got dozens of Dragon Ball Z episodes to watch from these collections, you'll still have plenty of content that'll keep your eyeballs glued to your TV.

Dragon Ball Blu-rays and DVDs

title: Disney Dreamlight Valley's Cozy Edition Gets An Early Black Friday Discount
description:
Disney Dreamlight Valley fulfills the age-old fantasy of owning real estate and being neighbors with Mickey Mouse. For Black Friday, you can pick up this delightful game as it prepares to exit the early access part of its development on December 5. Normally $50, Amazon and Best Buy is offering Disney Dreamlight Valley for $35.

This is a pretty good deal, because while Disney Dreamlight Valley was originally going to be a free-to-play title, developer Gameloft changed course and opted to make it a premium game that will receive regular content updates. In case you missed it when it was first announced, Disney Dreamlight Valley is essentially Animal Crossing meets The Sims. Not only will you build your own home while restoring the land to pristine beauty, you'll also interact with several characters from across th

title: Save $100 On This Logitech Racing Wheel Ahead Of Black Friday
description:
The Black Friday shopping season is upon us, and that means there are a great many deals available for pretty much anything you can think of. Amazon has a solid discount available on a couple Logitech racing wheels.

The Logitech G920 racing wheel for Xbox, PC, and Mac is marked down to $200 (down from $300). For PlayStation fans, the Logitech G29 racing wheel is also discounted to $200 (from $300), and it's compatible with PS5, PS4, PC, and Mac.

title: 8BitDo Ultimate Bluetooth Controller Hits Lowest Price Ever
description:
We're still about a week away from the official start of Black Friday, but Amazon has already launched its early Black Friday savings event. And if you've been shopping for an affordable yet powerful Switch controller, look at the 8BitDo Ultimate Bluetooth Controller with Charging Dock, which is listed for its lowest price ever.

8BitDo Ultimate Bluetooth Controller with Charging Dock

title: Lego Jurassic Park Sets Get Big Discounts For Black Friday
description:
Why get your hands dirty digging up fossils from 65 million years ago when you can easily construct an exhibit to the Jurassic era with Lego? The Lego Jurassic Park Visitor Center set is now available to order, and for $90 (normally $130), you get not only a cute tribute to one of the locations in the landmark, but also all the parts you need to reconstruct a mighty showdown in this Black Friday deal.

Spoilers for anyone who hasn't seen the film since it was first released 30 years ago, but the T-Rex wins the fight against the Velociraptors in that movie and gets a moment in the spotlight that is nothing short of iconic.

title: 8BitDo SN30 Pro Gets Huge Discount For Black Friday
description:

description:

title: Succession's Official Script Books Are On Sale For Black Friday
description:
HBO's critically acclaimed drama Succession has come to an end after four seasons, and fans who don't want their time with the show to end can pick up the original scripts for a good Black Friday discount.

Amazon is selling the official Season 1-4 script books for nice discounts as part of an early Black Friday sale. Each script book normally sells for $30, but Amazon has them marked down to as low as about $22 for Seasons 1 and 2. Season 4's script book, the newest one, is going for about $27.

Follow the links below to buy the official script books for Season 1-4 below. The scripts were written by Jesse Armstrong, who created Succession and was its showrunner.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Corsair Prebuilt Gaming PCs With RTX 40 Series GPUs Are On Sale For Black Friday
description:
If you're searching for a new gaming rig, there's no better time to pull the trigger than Black Friday. And while Black Friday traditionally starts the day after Thanksgiving, things have kicked off a bit earlier than usual this year. Swing by Amazon and you'll find a handful of Corsair rigs with steep discounts--all of which feature the powerful RTX 40 lineup.

The cheapest of the bunch is the Vengeance i7400 equipped with an Intel i5 and RTX 4060. Typically sold for $1,600, it's down to $1,425. That's the lowest price ever for the mid-range rig--so be sure to give it a look if you're seeking a reliable desktop that doesn't break the bank.

title: Steam Deck Update Improves LCD Color Display, Adds Support For New OLED Models
description:
The latest Steam Deck update changes the default color rendering on the LCD model to emulate sRGB color gamut, which should enable warmer and more vibrant colors.

Most of the update's biggest changes are to the display settings. While the LCD device's default setting has been changed to the sRGB, you can change it back to the "native" display or to a setting called "boosted," which further enhances color and appearance at the risk of gradient clipping. You can now enable HDR for when the Deck is connected to a display that supports the feature. VRR is also now supported.

In more general updates, external storag

title: These Popular Gaming Headsets Are On Sale For Black Friday
description:
Black Friday deals have officially started rolling in--and there's no shortage of incredible gaming headsets on sale. Products from Razer, Corsair, and Logitech are discounted to some of their lowest prices of 2023, though we're not sure how long inventory will stick around for the best deals.

The most generous discounts can be found at Amazon, with more than 20 popular headsets on sale at the retailer. One of our favorites is for Razer BlackShark V2, which is $60 (down from $100). Featuring 50mm drivers, a sleek black design with green accents, and ultra-comfortable memory foam ear cushions, it's one of the best gaming headsets on the market.

title: Get Gran Turismo Movie For A Nice Discount In Early Black Friday Deal
description:
The Gran Turismo movie made more than $120 million at the box office during its theatrical run earlier this year. The film is now available on home video, and a number of digital stores have discounted the film ahead of Black Friday.

Amazon is selling the movie for $7, while the Microsoft Store, Apple, and Vudu all have it for $10. You can follow the links below to order a copy of the movie for yourself. Additionally, Amazon has the physical edition of Gran Turismo on Blu-ray for $23 (down from $39).

title: The Grinch Christmas Adventures Deal Is So Good, You Won't Steal From Kids
description: Sure, we all know the Grinch was planning to steal presents from innocent children on Christmas--but what if the reason weren't that his heart was too small, but that his bank account balance was? Best Buy has a Black Friday deal on The Grinch Christmas Adventures that should keep the little green ghoul from having to resort to burgling and general deception.

title: Get Loads Of Bluey Episodes For Just $15 Dollarbucks
description:
Bluey is wonderful. You may have heard your friends talk about the wholesome and hilarious animated series on Disney Plus and thought, gee, I sure would like to own the misadventures of a tight-knit Australian dog family on physical media. Well good news, as Amazon's Black Friday deals include the complete first and second seasons for just $15.

See at Amazon

The DVD set includes 103 episodes across four discs, covering most of the episodes that made the Heeler family into breakout stars. title: Attack On Titan Anime And Manga Box Sets Get Huge Discounts For Black Friday
description:
It's the end of an era for Attack on Titan fans now that the anime has concluded, but for anyone looking for the complete experience, Black Friday is here to help you out. Equal parts exhilarating with its gravity defying battles and heartbreaking when it tackles serious themes, Attack on Titan Blu-ray collections are worth picking up if you're an anime fan.

Set in a world where humanity has constructed a city of impenetrable walls to protect itself from almost-unkillable man-eating giants, Attack on Titan follows Eren Yeager alongside his friends Mikasa Ackerman and Armin Arlert. Things look good for the inhabitants, but after the Colossal Titan breaches their walls and more Titans come flooding in, things take a very bad turn for Eren.

After he witnesses his mom being murdered by a Titan, he swears to have his revenge and enlists in the Survey Corps so that he can develop the skills he needs to fight back.

title: Most Wholesome Xbox Ever Has Just Been Revealed, And You Can Win It
description:
Xbox has given away custom consoles for a variety of partnerships, with recent examples including the upcoming Wonka film and Diablo IV. The latest giveaway, however, is the most wholesome Xbox console ever made: Behold, the custom Bluey Xbox Series X.

This custom Xbox Series X turns the rectangular device into the plucky blue heeler dog from the wildly popular Australian kids show all-ages show for everyone, with a custom blue controller featuring Bluey and her sister Bingo to boot. Xbox is giving away the custom console on X (formerly Twitter), and only one lucky person will be taking it home.

The perfect way to play Bluey The Videogame: with a #Bluey Xbox!

title: Marvel HeroClix And Other Tabletop Games Discounted For Black Friday
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe continues to grow, so it should be no surprise that its heroes have spilled over into the realm of board and tabletop games. Many of these games are surprisingly well-designed, with the HeroClix lineup being a standout. Now's a great time to check out the tabletop action, as Amazon is slashing prices by ridiculous margins for Black Friday, bringing them down to much more manageable levels.

If you're interested in checking out HeroClix, look at the two miniatures games on sale right now. These offer everything you need to run a campaign, such as map tiles, character cards, objects and terrain, and pre-painted miniatures. Black Friday deals include the What If Miniature Game for $25 (down from $30) and the X-Men Miniatures Game for $30 (down from $70).</

title: Get These Adorable Gaming Plush Toys For A Nice Discount In Early Black Friday Deal
description:
You don't have to wait one minute longer to score a good Black Friday deal, as Best Buy has launched some of its early Black Friday offers. One such deal is on a variety of adorable gaming-themed plush toys.

Best Buy is selling Tomy's Club Mocchi Mocchi's Master Chief, Sonic the Hedgehog, Animal Crossing, and The Legend of Zelda plush toys for nice discounts right now.

The Master Chief plush is marked down to $28 (from $35), while the 15-inch Sonic the Hedgehog toy is d

title: Black Friday Deal: Amazon Slashing Prices On Pandemic Board Games
description:
Amazon is dropping prices on a wide range of board games for Black Friday, but few discounts are as enticing as the ones offered for Pandemic and its many spin-offs. The strategic cooperative game is now listed for just $30 (down from $40), which is one of the better prices we've seen this year.

Pandemic tasks you and up to four other players with eradicating a variety of different diseases before they sweep across the globe and do irreparable harm to humanity. Each player is given a different occupation--and properly utilizing your skills and working with your team is the only way to emerge victorious. It's a fairly simple game to learn, but with so many nuances and different gameplay scenarios, it'll take you years to master.

If you've already played the base game, consider looking at one of the many spin-offs on sale at Amazon. This includes

title: Western Digital SSD Black Friday Deal Adds 4TB To Your PS5
description:
There's no denying it: Video games are getting bigger and standard consoles are struggling to keep up. Fortunately, PC and PS5 owners can grab a great Black Friday deal on this Western Digital SSD that'll add a chunky 4TB of storage capacity to your system. Normally $372, this sleek piece of NVMe technology is currently on sale for $300.

title: NBA 2K24 Is Half Off Right Now At Best Buy In Early Black Friday Deal
description:
Some Black Friday deals have begun to arrive early, and this includes a nice discount on the latest entry in the NBA 2K series. Best Buy is currently selling NBA 2K24 for about half-off in one of the best offers we've seen on the game since it launched in September.

Best Buy has the game discounted to $35 on Xbox Series X|S and PS5, with the Switch, Xbox One, and PS4 versions dropped down to $30. The Black Mamba Edition, meanwhile, is marked down from $100 to $50 on all platforms. Use the link below to pick up a copy for yourself.

Get NBA 2K24 for half off at Best Buy

NBA 2K24 released in September of this year. GameSpot's NBA 2K24 review praised the game's on-court gameplay for feeling cons

title: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2 Is Just $35 In Black Friday Deal
description:
In the mood for a racing game that merges childhood nostalgia with an easily accessible format? Then you'll want to check out this Black Friday deal on Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged, as the game has been discounted to $35 across multiple platforms.

Available at Amazon and Best Buy, Hot Wheels Unleashed 2 builds on the first game in the series and throws in some neat upgrades for the matchbox car racing adventure. New abilities have been added, races now take place across even more imaginative levels, and the game is a visual treat with its recreation of the beloved toy cars. The game only just launched in October, so this is a nice discount over the standard $50 price.

Hot Wheels Unleashed 2 Black Friday deal at Amazon

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Final Fantasy 16 Discounted To Best Price Yet In Black Friday Deal
description:
Final Fantasy 16 is easily one of the boldest entries in the long-running Square-Enix franchise, and in case you missed it when it was released earlier this year, this Black Friday special offers the game at its best price yet. Available for $40 through Amazon and Best Buy, you can pick up one of the best games of the year and enjoy a PS5 title that goes all in on action.

See on Amazon
See at Best Buy

While every Final Fantasy game is different, Final Fantasy 16 takes the RPG roots of the series and injects a healthy dose of action into its design. The result feels like a mix

title: This Awesome Lego Technic Set Is $50 Off For Black Friday
description:
Lego's line of Technic toys are brilliant for anyone looking for a more challenging and time-consuming build. These kits usually have a lot more pieces than standard sets, require plenty of dexterity in your fingers, and allow you to add in several interactive features. For Black Friday 2023, you can get a big discount on the Technic Transformation vehicle as it is on sale for $100 (normally $150) as an Amazon Lightning Deal.

See on Amazon

This tank-like build is a

title: Destiny 2: Season Of The Wish Brings Back Dragon's Breath And Makes It Better Than Ever
description:
With Season of the Wish arriving later this month, Bungie has dropped some new details on the Exotic weapon that'll be offered in Destiny 2's season pass. It's good news for fans of the original Destiny's Exotic rocket launchers, as next season will see an updated version of Dragon's Breath added to the game's arsenal.

This rocket launcher was first added in Destiny's Dark Below expansion, and its primary perk was that it was a fire-and-forget weapon. A simple delivery mechanism for a high-yield explosive, Dragon's Breath was an uncomplicated Exotic with a high attack power. Things have changed a lot since then when it comes to weapons in Destiny 2, and for this incarnation, Dragon's Breath has received some big upgrades that revolve around patience and finding the right target.

title: Save Big On My Hero Academia Blu-Rays For Black Friday
description: One of the big breakout anime success stories over the last couple of years has been My Hero Academia, a show focused on the next generation of superheroes. For Black Friday 2023, several seasons of the anime adaptation is on sale, and if you're looking for a charming show that features terrific animation, colorful characters, and riveting storylines, this one is not be missed. And if you'd like to read the source material first, you can pick up the 20-volume My Hero Academia manga box set for only $98 (down from $180).

title: The Sims 5 Multiplayer Could Be Inspired By Animal Crossing Or Among Us
description:
The newest upcoming Sims game, codenamed Project Rene but more generally referred to as Sims 5, is looking for a way to implement multiplayer, a new interview with VP Lindsay Pearson suggests. The Sims team is looking at different examples of multiplayer gaming styles to figure out how Sims fans can enjoy the next game with friends.

Speaking on the One More Life podcast, Sims vice president of franchise creative Lyndsay Pearson was asked about rumors that The Sims 5 would be integrating multiplayer for the first time in franchise history.

"We definitely want to introduce multiplayer," Pearson answered. "Not multiplayer in the big, scary 'jump into a world full of strangers' kind of way, but literally how do you and your friends want to play together? There's a lot of different flavors that could take, so we're exploring a lot of different spaces there, because playing together can look like so many different things."

title: New Sims-Like Game InZOI Reveals A Photorealistic Take On Life Sims
description:
There's a new Sims rival on the way--InZOI, a new life simulator by Korean developer Krafton. InZOI puts you in the godlike position of controlling the daily life of a neighbourhood full of "ZOIs", including managing their jobs, relationships, and the spaces they live and work in.

Krafton has just released its first gameplay footage of the life sim, showing off character creation, building and decorating modes, character interactions and relationships, and heaps more, all in a gorgeous photorealistic style powered by Unreal Engine 5.

In an internal interview, the game's producer Hyungjun Kim explained the concept behind the game. The player takes the role of an intern at a company, where their job is to manage (or control) the lives of a neighbourhood full of ZOI. The cat in the trailer is actually the company boss, he adds.

title: Magic: The Gathering Doctor Who Cards Are Discounted Ahead Of Black Friday
description:
Magic: The Gathering collectors can save on Doctor Who Commander Decks at Amazon ahead of Black Friday 2023. The decks come with everything you need to start playing.

See all Magic: The Gathering deals

The Paradox Power and Blast from the Past Commander Decks are the most compelling offers, as each deck is down to $42 (normally $57). Each of these bundles includes 100 cards, a two-card collector booster sample pack, and all the accessories needed to play a game of MTG. Included among those 100 cards are 50 never-before-seen cards with artwork from the iconic series.

There are four Doctor Who

title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds And Snakes Ending Explained
description:
The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes is a very different sort of story than the previous Hunger Games movies, focusing on a mentor as the main character rather than one of the participants in the annual battle royale. But it's not just any mentor in the spotlight--this prequel is all about young Coriolanus Snow, who will grow up to become the evil President Snow. This is the story of how and why he ended up on that path toward being an oppressive dictator.

Warning: This article contains numerous spoilers for The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes, including a detailed discussion of its ending.
